item.title: projects
item.description: ✔ active ✔ medoix.com This website you are viewing now.. it is a staticaly generated website with an automated workflow to generate the static conent and serve it. goodreads-json Third party GoodReads API returning JSON instead of XML todo Terminal Task (To Do) Application written in GO huecli CLI program to control Phillips Hue lights written in GO twitchirc Twitch IRC client to join and receive messages for a given Twitch channel
